role.argrole: thing arg0 is in a hurry to do

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (NP-TMP (CP-APP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 急欲) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 走向) (NP-OBJ (NN 国际) (NN 岛)))))) (DEC 的)) (NP (NN 同时))) (PU ，) (ADVP (AD 却)) (ADVP (AD 又)) (PP-LOC (P 在) (LCP (NP (DNP (NP (NN 关键) (NN 因素)) (DEG 的)) (NP (QP (CD 两)) (NP (NN 岸))) (NP (NN 关系))) (LC 上))) (ADVP (AD 未)) (VP (VE 有) (NP-OBJ (ADJP (JJ 显著)) (NP (NN 进展))))))
